模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World

类 GameObject

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World.GameObject
直接已知子类:
DoorUnit, MapObject, UpdatableObject
public abstract class GameObject extends Object
GameObject are the objects on the InteractableWorld screen. Every GameObject has a position and dimensions. GameObjects can detect if they are overlapping another GameObject and must have a CollideBehavior.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameObject

      public GameObject​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum, int width, int height)
      The constructor to initialize a unit on map
      参数:
      world - indicates in which canvas to draw the game object
      colNum - indicates the unit horizontal coordination of the game object
      rowNum - indicates the unit vertical coordination of the game object
      width - indicates the horizontal length of the game object
      height - indicates the vertical dimension of the game object

    • GameObject

      public GameObject​(int x, int y, int width, int height, InteractableWorld world)
      The constructor to add a unit into map
      参数:
      world - indicate the position of the game object
      x - indicates the horizontal coordination of the game object
      y - indicates the vertical coordination of the game object
      width - indicates the horizontal length of the game object
      height - indicates the vertical dimension of the game object

  • 方法详细资料

    • setCollideBehavior

      public void setCollideBehavior​(CollideBehavior collideBehavior)
      sets collide behavior for the object with other objects
      参数:
      collideBehavior - indicates what will happen when it collides other objects

      public CollideBehavior getCollideBehavior()

      public boolean overlaps​(GameObject obj)
